# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an image format with a raw integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt32)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The raw integer value of the image format.

## Constants

- **init(_:)**: Initializes an image format with an integer value.
